revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject United States|class=FA|importance=low|NC=Yes|NC-importance=low}} {{WikiProject Biography|living=no |class=FA |military-work-group=yes |military-priority=mid |listas=Sumner, Jethro }} {{WikiProject Military history|class=FA|A-Class=pass|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|Biography=yes|US=yes|ARW=yes}} {{WikiProject United States|class=FA|importance=low|NC=Yes|NC-importance=low}} {{WikiProject Virginia|class=FA|importance=low}} }}{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=13:50, 26 June 2013 |action1link=/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=561672813 |action2=WAR |action2date=09:33, 16 August 2013 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Jethro Sumner |action2result=approved |action2oldid=568018739 |action3=FAC |action3date=10:04, 25 November 2013 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Jethro Sumner/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=583212057 |currentstatus=FA |topic=warfare |maindate=24 August 2015 }} {{Talk:Jethro Sumner/GA1}} == Sumner image == The image was [http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=mr&GSln=Sumner&GSfn=Jethro&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=82278066&MRid=47006204&df=all& uploaded] to Ancestry by a relative, Jim Sumner. While some sources on Ancestry.com are not reliable, I feel certain this one is, although a second citation (like a picture in a book) would certainly be more preferable. --[[User:♥Golf|EditorExtraordinaire]] ([[User talk:♥Golf|talk]]) 11:05, 24 August 2015 (UTC) :{{reply to|♥Golf}}: While your efforts are appreciated, that image is wildly inaccurate in a number of ways. The uniform depicted is that of a mid-late 19th century general, with the construction and epaulettes being those that you would find on a Mexican American war uniform. The presence of a beard is also a mid-late 19th century factor. After doing some research, that is a litho of [[Edwin Vose Sumner]] from an issue of [http://www.sonofthesouth.net/leefoundation/civil-war/1862/june/general-sumner.htm Harper's Weekly]. [[User:Cdtew|'''Cdtew''']] ([[User talk:Cdtew|talk]]) 23:19, 25 August 2015 (UTC) :::Good work, [[User:Cdtew|Cdtew]]. I thought that beard looked a bit suspect myself (more like a Civil War-era or later look). My confidence in what I find on Ancestry is dwindling by the minute! With that in mind, I am also most appreciative of the work of [[User:Materialscientist|Materialscientist]] in quickly reverting the image. Lesson learned: I will do more research myself on matters of this sort. --[[User:♥Golf|EditorExtraordinaire]] ([[User talk:♥Golf|talk]]) 23:40, 25 August 2015 (UTC)
